articles.description: ​Market valuation of eight of the 10 most valued firms jumped Rs 1,10,106.83 crore last week, with Reliance Industries Ltd (RIL) emerging as the biggest gainer.

articles.author: Meghna Sen
articles.title: HDFC Bank receives RBI approval for sale of 90% stake in HDFC Credila - CNBCTV18
articles.description: HDFC Bank will retain a 9.99% stake in HDFC Credila, which provides education loans to students pursuing higher education in India and overseas.

articles.title: Maharashtra Revokes Licence Of McDonald's Outlet After Action Over Cheese - NDTV
articles.description: The Maharashtra Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has revoked the licence of a McDonald's outlet in the state's Ahmednagar district after taking action against it over cheese, an official said on Saturday.
articles.content:
